description: Hello! I am a fourth year Computer Science student at the University of Waterloo. I find myself fascinated by visual computing and computer graphics.

I am currently a 3D Software Developer Co-op at SideFX Software, working on Houdini. Previously, I was an Undergraduate Research Assistant with the Computational Motion Group at the University of Waterloo, supervised by Professor Christopher Batty.
Beyond software, I enjoy reading, writing, chess, film, and sewing.
